casebody.data:
T.W. Grogan Company, Inc., Appellee, v. Grogan et al., Appellants.

[Cite as T.W. Grogan Co., Inc. v. Grogan (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 1235.]

(No. 00-851 Submitted February 6, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.) Kahn, Kleinman, Yanountz & Amson Co., L.P.A., James J. Bartolozzi, Sheldon Bems and Shira Adler, for appellee. Kohrman, Jackson & Krantz, P.L.L., James B. Rosenthal and Byron S. Krantz; Elfvin & Besser, L.P.A., Bruce B. Elfvin, Barbara Kaye Besser and Amy S. Glesius, for appellants.

The cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
